text: Do you remember when I registered at the police station to search for my family?
He said they found a uncle of mine.
A distant uncle named Jason Wu. He travels a lot for business and changed his household registration a long time ago.
That's great! How are you feeling now?
The police gave me his phone number, but I'm a bit nervous and don't know what to say.
Don't be nervous, just treat it like meeting a new friend.
You can start by chatting about recent updates, and gradually get to know each other.
Yeah, let me digest this first. Thanks for always being there for me.
Just be careful if he asks to borrow money
Haha don't worry, I'm not that naive.
